name: Asteroids (itch) (PineappleG4MER)
description:
A simple game based on the highly popular game Asteroids. 

The controls are simple and fluid.                                                                                                         - Use the arrow keys to fly around in your spaceship.                                                                  - Press Space to shoot your bullets and destroy the asteroids standing in your way.

Aim to get the highest score possible with only 3 lives

Press 'F' to go full screen and 'G' to go back
